spell.tubois_druidry.fertilize.guide: Hold to cast a cone of natural energy, causing plants and soil caught within the cone to rapidly sprout and grow.
Summon a bumbleguard hive to protect the area. The hive spawns valiant bees which will attack any hostile mobs that come near it.
death.attack.tubois_druidry.hidden_boomb: %1$s stepped on %2$s's hidden boombloom and was annihilated
ui.tubois_druidry.boombloom_error_target: Cast bloomboom at the root of a flower!
ui.tubois_druidry.boombloom_error_occupi: A boombloom has already been placed at this location!
ui.tubois_druidry.bumbleguard_error_targ: Target a bee nest or hive to use the spell!
ui.tubois_druidry.bumbleguard_error_too_: The target is too close to another bumbleguard hive!
